pr_title: MULE-18269: XML SDK primary parameters are sent as null

timeline.message: MULE-18269: XML SDK primary parameters are sent as null

timeline.bodyText: this actually applies to any ooptional parameter, not just the primary content ones. Also, if that default value is an expression, where is that evaluated?
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

replies.bodyText: the execution evaluates that, will check for other optional params
replies.author: elrodro83

replies.bodyText: optional parameters have tests and are green: ModuleSimpleTestCase#testSetPayloadParamDefaultUseOptionalFlow
replies.author: elrodro83
